pullRequest.title: Suppress CVEs for htrace-core4 and openstack-swift
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
CVE-2013-7109 can be ignored for openstack-swift as it is for the python SDK and druid uses the java SDK.
The jackson-databind:2.4.0 CVEs via htrace-core4 are all suppressed for now as fixing them requires updating the hadoop version.

This PR has:

 been self-reviewed.
 added comments explaining the "why" and the intent of the code wherever would not be obvious for an unfamiliar reader.

commit.message:
Suppress CVEs for htrace-core4 and openstack-swift

CVE-2013-7109 can be ignored for openstack-swift as it is for the python
SDK and druid uses the java SDK.

The jackson-databind:2.4.0 CVEs via htrace-core4 are all suppressed for
now as fixing them requires updating the hadoop version.

nodes.bodyText: should there be a github issue to update this dependency?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -169,27 +170,18 @@
     <notes><![CDATA[
    file name: htrace-core4-4.0.1-incubating.jar (shaded: com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-databind:2.4.0)
    ]]></notes>
-    <packageUrl regex="true">^pkg:maven/com\.fasterxml\.jackson\.core/jackson\-databind@.*$</packageUrl>

+    <packageUrl regex="true">^pkg:maven/com\.fasterxml\.jackson\.core/jackson\-databind@2.4.0$</packageUrl>
+    <cve>CVE-2018-14721</cve>  <!-- cvss of 10.0 -->
+    <cvssBelow>10</cvssBelow>  <!-- suppress all CVEs for jackson-databind:2.4.0 since it is via htrace-core4 -->
